description: The Motive is the lightest and most streamlined AscentShell™ rain jacket, and the very best option for running, cycling, and fast hiking in wet weather. With 3L protection, stretch, and supreme breathability, it is the ultimate active waterproof jacket.
name: Outdoor Research Motive AscentShell Jacket - Mens

specs.value: AscentShell™ 3L, 100% Polyester 50D Mechanical Stretch Plainweave with 100% Polyester 30D Knit Backer
